segments.text: Jack , what do you think about the election ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the campaign is a blockbuster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many people have flung their hats into the ring ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Finally 100 candidates ran for one seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who do you think will be elected ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . They all had an active campaign to round up the votes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think Mr . White would be elected , you know he has spent millions in this campaign and he blasted the opposition in his campaign speech .
segments.speaker: S1
